item.title: How can i add slayer to my ::pure command?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); sM("You Are know Ready for Pking =)"); }

item.title: How can i add slayer to my ::pure command?

item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

here is my pure command but how can i add the slayer to it,??

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sM("You Are know Ready for Pking =)"); }
